title: "GM's Cruise self-driving unit may buy Palo Alto-based Udacity spinoff Voyage"
excerpt: "General Motors Co.'s self-driving unit Cruise is reportedly in talks to buy Voyage Auto Inc., the Palo Alto-based self-driving vehicle startup that spun out of Udacity in 2017. Bloomberg cited unnamed sources who said the companies are in serious discussions but no deal is imminent."
